comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pictures of Interest, and we'd love to have this added to the group! What a fabulous picture from this old land steeped in history. I am very glad I came across this wonderfull site full of wonderfull old characters. The pictures deserved to be preserved and seen.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content:
It's really something is'nt it Kookaburra?
If you have a look at the site 'Pictures of Interest' you will see some more pictures from the very good National Library of Wales that you may find interesting.
If I have my way we will be seeing more from this excellent site.
